content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, wrapped in the specified output tags:

<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Dear [Customer Name],

Thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention. In order to best address the issues you've raised, I will need to escalate your case to our [relevant department name] team for further investigation. One of our specialists from that department will review the details of your case and will be in touch with you directly to discuss a resolution.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any additional information that you think would be helpful for their investigation. We appreciate your patience as we work to thoroughly address your concerns.

Regards,
[Your Name]
Customer Service Representative
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
